summary: The diff shows only a metadata update to project_state.json that tracks the deployment request (AR-1/REQ-1) with status 'pending'. No actual deployment actions, configuration changes, or deployment artifacts are present in the diff. REQ-1 requires completing the deployment to Internet Computer, but the diff only documents the intention to deploy without executing it.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the deployment of the existing application to the Internet Computer network without any code changes
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only updates project tracking metadata. No deployment commands, configuration updates, canister deployments, or deployment artifacts are present. The requirement demands actual deployment completion with canisters running and accessible, but the diff shows only status tracking.
